bibl.title: [Coin Hoards 2008. Ancient Hoards.] A Parcel of Late Roman Bronze Coins from Thebes.
bibl.note: 61 coins in the National Museum of Scotland, donated in 1858 by Dr. J. Ivor Murray (1824-1903). - The Coins (N.M.McQ.H.). - Catalogue: A. The possible hoard [28 coins, mostly from western mints, AD 313-4 to 323-4]; - B. Other Roman imperial coins [31 coins, mostly from Antioch and Alexandria, AD 364-75]; - Other coins [2 coins]. - The fourth-century Theban necropolis (E.R.O'C.).
bibl.seg: Nicholas M.McQ. Holmes & Elisabeth R. O'Connell, [Coin Hoards 2008. Ancient Hoards.] A Parcel of Late Roman Bronze Coins from Thebes.

61 coins in the National Museum of Scotland, donated in 1858 by Dr. J. Ivor Murray (1824-1903). - The Coins (N.M.McQ.H.). - Catalogue: A. The possible hoard [28 coins, mostly from western mints, AD 313-4 to 323-4]; - B. Other Roman imperial coins [31 coins, mostly from Antioch and Alexandria, AD 364-75]; - Other coins [2 coins]. - The fourth-century Theban necropolis (E.R.O'C.).
